channel.title: I have a small problem that creates lots of problems for me! help!
channel.description:
ok everytime i try and register my server on the server status page, i fill out all the info, make the password, list the name of the server, list the server ip, but everytime after i click submit it comes up with this:
"You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near ' IP` = 'my ip address' OR `ipfield` = 'my ip address'' at line 1"
k now what does that mean?? plz someone help me who knows how to fix this. :(

lol im sorry, forgive me?
